nortelNMItextConvMIB.name: nortelNMItextConvMIB

revisions.description: Change the description of NortelNMIneType. Revision introduced by Jingdong LIU.
The fourth version of this MIB module. Module-Identity OID assignment changed. Comments modified.

The third version of this MIB module. Contact info updated and Revision history added. Syntaxes changed to - NortelNMIneType - NortelNMIadminState - NortelNMIoperState Revisions introduced by Shobana Sundaram.
The second version of this MIB module. Contact info updated and Revision history added. Comments modified.
The first version of this MIB module.

nortelNMItextConvMIB.contactinfo: Jingdong Liu Postal: Nortel Networks P. O. Box 3511, Station C Ottawa, Ontario CANADA K1Y 4H7 Email: jingdong@nortelnetworks.com
nortelNMItextConvMIB.description: This module contains the definitions of some proprietary textual conventions for the Nortel generic NetworkManagementInterface (NMI) mibs.

NortelNMItimeStampDef.name: NortelNMItimeStampDef
NortelNMItimeStampDef.description: Represents the time in seconds since the reference epoch, zero hours:zero minutes:zero seconds, Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), January 1, 1970. This timestamp definition would be used to accurately reflect the time of occurrence of various events at the Nortel Network Management Interface (NMI).

NortelNMIneType.name: NortelNMIneType
NortelNMIneType.description: Represents the various possible NE types that are monitored via the Nortel NMI MIBs. The NeType string should be a single word, can only contain alphanumeric characters and underscores. No commas, spaces, slashes, hyphens, or dollar signs is allowed.

NortelNMIadminState.name: NortelNMIadminState
NortelNMIadminState.description: Represents the various possible administrative states (ITU-T X.731) that are monitored via the Nortel NMI MIBs.

NortelNMIoperState.name: NortelNMIoperState
NortelNMIoperState.description: Represents the possible values of operational states (ITU-T X.731) that are monitored via the Nortel NMI MIBs.

NortelNMIunknownStatusValue.name: NortelNMIunknownStatusValue
NortelNMIunknownStatusValue.description: Represents the unknown status value to be true / false (ITU-T X.731). This indicates whether the management system is able to maintain OAM communications with the managed entity or not.

NortelNMIalarmProblemCategory.name: NortelNMIalarmProblemCategory
NortelNMIalarmProblemCategory.description: Represents the alarm problem category values (ITU-T X.733).

NortelNMInotificationTypes.name: NortelNMInotificationTypes
NortelNMInotificationTypes.description: Represents the type of Notification to be traps or Informs. Inform PDUs get acknowledgements / responses while traps don't.

NortelNMIalarmProbableCause.name: NortelNMIalarmProbableCause
NortelNMIalarmProbableCause.description: Represents the probable cause values for the alarms as per (ITU-T X.733, X.736).
